## SRC\_I variable

Porter-Duff operator for packed ints. Always results in `src` color, `dest` ignored.

[porterDuff](./porter-duff.porterduff.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SRC_I: (a: number, b: number) => number
```
